title: Minimalist Scandinavian Retreat with Private Green Space in Górna
description: Embrace tranquility in this chic, Scandinavian-inspired two-bedroom apartment tucked in the heart of Górna. With 57 sqm of thoughtfully designed living space, this home merges clean lines, natural finishes, and an abundance of light. Step outside to your very own private garden with a dedicated barbecue area—perfect for quiet mornings or gatherings with friends. The residence boasts convenient features such as an automatic gate, secure storage locker, and a heated driveway for effortless comfort year-round.
neighborhood_description: Górna offers a balance of historic charm and active urban convenience, just minutes from the lively center of Łódź. Enjoy lush green parks, architecturally-preserved streets, and vibrant local life. Residents have access to extensive bike lines and efficient public transport, making eco-friendly commutes part of daily routine.
lifestyle_benefits: easy access to public transport and bike lines
target_buyer: Ideal for eco-conscious professionals and small families seeking minimalist living with easy access to the city centre and sustainable transport.
market_positioning: This home delivers design-focused, sustainable living with rare amenities in Górna's medium-urban landscape, providing excellent value for buyers seeking comfort, security, and a connection to outdoor living in Łódź.
